### Multi-line caption

\begin{table*}[t]
    \caption{Evaluation results \cite{nltk} metrics. \\
    *MIP-maximal-information prompt\\
    **Counting F1 score}
    \label{tab:results}
\end{table*}

---

\begin{table*}[t]
    \caption{<s>Rinyhngvba erfhygf <latex>\cite{nltk}</latex> zrgevpf.</s> \\
    <s>*ZVC-znkvzny-vasbezngvba cebzcg</s>\\
    <s>**Pbhagvat S1 fpber</s>}
    \label{tab:results}
\end{table*}

### \multirow and \multicolumn

\begin{tabular}{cc}
    \multirow{2}{*}{Method} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Edit distance$\downarrow$} \\
\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}{cc}
    \multirow{2}{*}{<s>Zrgubq</s>} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{<s>Rqvg qvfgnapr</s>$\downarrow$} \\
\end{tabular}

### \toprule, \midrule, \bottomrule, \hline

\begin{tabular}{lcc}
\toprule
    {Method}                      &       {$\frac{tkn}{step}$}            & {WER}   \\
    \midrule
    Nougat \cite{Nougat} & 1 & - \\
    \hline
    Caramel \cite{Caramel} & 1 & - \\
    \bottomrule
\end{tabular}

---

    \midrule

### \resizebox

\resizebox{\textwidth}{!}{
    \begin{tabular}{c}
        Foo \\
        Bar \\
    \end{tabular}
}

---

\resizebox{\textwidth}{!}{
    \begin{tabular}{c}
        <s>Sbb</s> \\
        <s>One</s> \\
    \end{tabular}
}

### [xfail] \cmidrule

\begin{tabular}{cc}
\toprule[.9pt]
Foo & Bar \\
\cmidrule(rl){1-2}
X & Y \\
\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}{cc}
\toprule[.9pt]
<s>Sbb</s> & <s>One</s> \\
\cmidrule(rl){1-2}
<s>K</s> & <s>L</s> \\
\end{tabular}

### [xfail] \makecell

\begin{tabular}{lcc}
    \makecell[l]{\textbf{Foo-bar} \\
    \textbf{Common Crawl} \\ 
    \textbf{samples}} & 123             & {Plain, Boxes, Classes}\\
\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}{lcc}
    \makecell[l]{\textbf{<s>Sbb-one</s>} \\
    \textbf{<s>Pbzzba Penjy</s>} \\ 
    \textbf{<s>fnzcyrf</s>}} & 123             & {<s>Cynva, Obkrf, Pynffrf</s>}\\
\end{tabular}

### \subfloat

\begin{tabular}{ccc}
\subfloat{...}
\subfloat[Foo]{...}
\subfloat[Foo][Bar]{...}
\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}{ccc}
\subfloat{...}
\subfloat[<s>Sbb</s>]{...}
\subfloat[<s>Sbb</s>][<s>One</s>]{...}
\end{tabular}

### \tabular with paragraph columns

\begin{tabular}{ |p{3cm}| }
foo \\
\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}{ |p{3cm}| }
<s>sbb</s> \\
\end{tabular}

### \tabular with optional alignment

\begin{tabular}[c]{@{}c@{}}abc \\ xyz\end{tabular}

---

\begin{tabular}[c]{@{}c@{}}<s>nop</s> \\ <s>klm</s>\end{tabular}

### \tabularx

\begin{tabularx}{250pt}{|c|X|c|X|}
foo \\
\end{tabularx}

\begin{tabularx}{250pt}[z]{|c|X|c|X|}
foo \\
\end{tabularx}
    
---

\begin{tabularx}{250pt}{|c|X|c|X|}
<s>sbb</s> \\
\end{tabularx}

\begin{tabularx}{250pt}[z]{|c|X|c|X|}
<s>sbb</s> \\
\end{tabularx}
